patterns: What types of taxis are available?
responses: City Taxi offers a variety of vehicles suited for low to mid-income passengers. Available options include three-wheelers, mini cars, and compact sedans. These vehicles provide affordable and comfortable transportation tailored to meet your budget while ensuring a quality service.

At City Taxi, we provide three main types of vehicles: three-wheelers, mini cars, and compact sedans. These options are designed to offer a cost-effective and reliable transportation experience for all passengers.

Our fleet includes three-wheelers for short trips, mini cars for small groups or individual passengers, and compact sedans for a more comfortable yet affordable ride. Each option is aimed at offering budget-friendly and reliable transportation.

City Taxi offers a range of vehicles to cater to different passenger needs. Our fleet includes three-wheelers, mini cars, and compact sedans, providing passengers with affordable and comfortable transportation options.
We have three types of vehicles available: three-wheelers, mini cars, and compact sedans. These options are designed to offer passengers a cost-effective and reliable transportation experience.

City Taxi provides a variety of vehicles to suit different passenger needs. Our fleet includes three-wheelers, mini cars, and compact sedans, offering affordable and comfortable transportation options.
We offer three types of vehicles: three-wheelers, mini cars, and compact sedans. These options are designed to provide passengers with affordable and reliable transportation services.

How to register as a driver?
responses: To register as a driver with City Taxi, simply visit our website and click on 'Driver Sign Up'. You will need to provide your personal details, upload the necessary documents, and submit your application. Once verified, you'll receive your login details via email.

Registering as a driver is easy! Just go to the 'Driver Sign Up' section on our website, fill in your details, upload the required documents, and submit your registration. After verification, you'll get an email with your login credentials.

You can register as a driver by going to our website and selecting 'Driver Sign Up'. Complete the form with your information, upload the required documents, and submit your application. We'll review your details and send your login information once everything is verified.

patterns: What are the driver registration requirements?
responses: To register as a driver, you need to provide a valid driver's license, a national ID or passport, proof of vehicle ownership, and vehicle insurance. All documents must be up-to-date and verified before your application can be approved.

patterns: How can I know if a driver is available?
responses: Drivers can show their availability by setting the status to 'AVAILABLE'. If they pick up a ride, their status will automatically change to 'BUSY'. You can check for available drivers near you when booking a ride through the system.
Drivers indicate their availability by setting their status to 'AVAILABLE' in the system. When you book a taxi, the system will show the closest available drivers for you to choose from.
To check if a driver is available, simply start a booking in the website. The system will display the available drivers closest to your location.
Drivers set their status to 'AVAILABLE' when they are ready to take trips. When you request a taxi, the system will find available drivers near you and provide their details.
Driver availability is automatically updated in the system when they set their status to 'AVAILABLE'. You can see available drivers when booking your ride.

Drivers can show their availability by setting the status to 'AVAILABLE'. If they pick up a ride, their status will automatically change to 'BUSY'. You can check for available drivers near you when booking a ride through the system.
